property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: Formerly fs.default.name, the default path prefix used by the Hadoop FS client when none is given.

property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.

property.name: hadoop.http.filter.initializers
property.description: A comma separated list of class names. Each class in the list must extend org.apache.hadoop.http.FilterInitializer. The corresponding Filter will be initialized. Then, the Filter will be applied to all user facing jsp and servlet web pages. The ordering of the list defines the ordering of the filters.

property.name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.enabled
property.description: Enables cross origin support for all web-services

property.name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.allowed-origins
property.description: Comma separated list of origins that are allowed, wildcards (*) and patterns allowed

property.name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.allowed-methods
property.description: Comma separated list of methods that are allowed

property.name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.allowed-headers
property.description: Comma separated list of headers that are allowed

property.name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.max-age
property.description: Number of seconds a pre-flighted request can be cached
